short_description_localized.en: The Executive Junior Suite features elegant furnishings and upscale amenities. At 377-494 square feet, they offer not only plenty of space but room to relax in comfort.
short_description_localized.es: The Executive Junior Suite features elegant furnishings and upscale amenities. At 377-494 square feet, they offer not only plenty of space but room to relax in comfort.

description_localized.en:
Upscale amenities, elegant furnishings and thoughtful details make for a spectacular stay in Manhattan.  

Delight in this well-appointed suite with a kitchenette and plenty of space to spread out and relax after another day of exploring. With 377-494 square feet of space, you’ll enjoy a superior stay in a perfect location.
description_localized.es:
Upscale amenities, elegant furnishings and thoughtful details make for a spectacular stay in Manhattan.  

Delight in this well-appointed suite with a kitchenette and plenty of space to spread out and relax after another day of exploring. With 377-494 square feet of space, you’ll enjoy a superior stay in a perfect location.

images.name: Executive-Jr.-Suite--Executive-Jr.-Suite---View-from-Sleeper-Sofa
images.caption: Executive Jr. Suite - View from Sleeper Sofa
images.description: This suite includes queen size bed, living area with sleeper sofa, arm chair, and tv.
images.alt: In the right corner of the room, a queen bed is nestled to the right of a double window. A tv rests on the wall between this window and another window, hanging above a small dresser. In front of the second window sits an arm chair. The arm chair, along with a couch perpendicular to it, surround a glass coffee table.

images.name: Executive-Jr.-Suite--Executive-Jr.-Suite-Living-Room---Partial-View
images.caption: Executive Jr. Suite Living Room - Partial View
images.description: The living room includes a sleeper sofa, arm chair, window, tv, and small dining table.
images.alt: The living room provides a sleeper sofa on the back wall with a glass coffee table in front of it. To the right, there is a standing lamp. A TV is suspended on the wall to the right of the window, above a dresser. Opposite the TV is a round dining table.

images.name: Executive-Jr.-Suite--Executive-Jr.-Suite-Bedroom---Partial-View
images.caption: Executive Jr. Suite Bedroom - Partial View
images.description: This suite includes a queen sized bed, 2 lamps and end tables, and a window.
images.alt: The queen sized bed, located between 2 end tables with lamps on them, and window to the left.

images.name: Executive-Jr.-Suite--Executive-Jr.-Suite--Kitchenette-area
images.caption: Executive Jr. Suite- Kitchenette area
images.description: This area has two chairs a table, mini refrigerator ,dishwasher and sink area.
images.alt: This area has two chairs a table, mini refrigerator ,dishwasher and sink area.
